Nick Graffis

Water Polo Coach

hi@nickgraffis.me

Long Beach

California, USA

About

Nick has been a water polo coach for 12 years and helped lead many teams from ages 7 - 25 to extremly abitious goals. This includes building the first girls program at Vanguard Aquatics and bringing them to multiple medal finishes in Junior Olympics. This also includes bringing the Edison High School girls water polo team to their first ever quarterfinal, and semifinal apperances, and taking the UC Irvine womens club team to their highest finishes in team history.

Work Experience

  • Vanguard Aquatics Head Coach

    August 31st, 2014 - present | Huntington Beach, CA

    • 2017 National Champions - 10U Coed
    • 2016 National Bronze Medalists - 10U Girls
    • 2017 National Silver Medalists - 10U Girls
    • 2018 National Silver Medalists - 10U Coed

  • Cypress Community College Adjunct Professor of Kinesiology, Assistant Water Polo Coach

    December 31st, 2019 - present | Cypress, California

  • Edison High School Head Mens and Womens Water Polo Coach

    May 1st, 2016 - present | Huntington Beach, California

    • 2020 CIF-SS Division IV Semifinalists
    • 2019 CIF-SS Division III Quarterfinalists
    • 2019 CIF-SS Division IV Quarterfinalists

  • Orange Coast Community College Adjunct Professor of Kinesiology, Assistant Water Polo & Swim Coach

    May 1st, 2019 - December 31st, 2019 | Costa Mesa, California

    • 2019 CCCAA State Champions

  • University of California, Irvine Head Womens Club Water Polo

    September 1st, 2013 - May 1st, 2015 | Irvine, California

    • 2015 CWPA National Semifinalists
    • 2015 Southwestern Division Runners-Up
    • 2015 Southwestern Division Coach of the Year
    • 2015 UCI Club Sports Coach of the Year

  • Huntington Beach High School Assistant Mens Water Polo Coach

    May 1st, 2016 - August 1st, 2018 | Huntington Beach, California

    • 2016 CIF-SS Division I Finalists
    • 2016 Sunset League Champions
    • 2017 Sunset League Runners-Up
    • 2017 CIF-SS Division I Quarterfinalists
    • 2018 Sunset League Runners-Up
